document_data.name: Jalarkh Ohngate
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|4}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 3: The Bron's Deputies}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Jalarkh Ohngate''' was a law enforcement officer in the town of [[Voonlar]] sometime during the term of Bron [[Buorstag Hlammythyl]], ''i.e.'', from about [[1355 DR]] until at least [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Jalarkh was born a mute and did not often take the initiative, but rather followed orders well.{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|4-5}}
document_data.Abilities: Jalarkh was incredibly strong and he spent much of his time practicing and training in various weapons. He was a specialist with the [[scimitar]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|4-5}}
document_data.Possessions: He wore [[chain mail]]{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|3}}
document_data.History: At some point in his life, he was trained by the [[Zhentilar]] and was chosen to be a deputy in Voonlar.
